meanings.definition: Relating to or involving physical exercise or sports.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys the gymnic activities at school.
meanings.sent2: The gymnic class focuses on movement and fitness.
meanings.sent3: The gymnic competition was full of energy and excitement.
meanings.sent4: His gymnic dedication shone through in his performance.
meanings.sent5: The gymnic routine left her feeling strong and accomplished.

meanings.definition: A type of physical exercise or sport.
meanings.sent1: He signed up for a gymnic class to stay active.
meanings.sent2: The gymnic involves stretching and cardio exercises.
meanings.sent3: The gymnic equipment made the workout more fun.
meanings.sent4: Joining the gymnic team boosted his confidence.
meanings.sent5: The gymnic session was challenging but rewarding.
